values.value:
• I am an Australian Tax Resident.
  • I have read and understood the Salary Sacrifice Policy and agree to abide by the provisions which may be varied from time to time.
  • I acknowledge that Woolworths has advised me to seek independent financial advice before considering the Woolworths offer to enter into this salary sacrifice arrangement.
  • I declare, the PRIMARY use of the device being sought for salary sacrifice will be for Woolworths Group Limited work/employment related purposes.
  • I am currently entitled to or using a Woolworths provided computing device.
  • Woolworths has not already supplied me with a laptop computer, tablet or smartphone with the same functionality as the device to which I am seeking to salary sacrifice. Any private use of the item will be incidental to the primary work use of the item.
